meanings.definition: To waste time or money on unimportant things.
meanings.sent1: Don't fritter away your time playing video games all day.
meanings.sent2: She tends to fritter her money on unnecessary gadgets.
meanings.sent3: Instead of studying, he chose to fritter his time watching cat videos.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams of success will fritter away if she doesn't take action.
meanings.sent5: Time is too precious to fritter on trivial matters.

meanings.definition: A small piece of food that has been coated in batter and fried.
meanings.sent1: The bakery sells delicious apple fritters.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed a crispy banana fritter for dessert.
meanings.sent3: The fritter was so tasty, it disappeared in seconds.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the freshly fried fritter filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The golden fritter was a delightful treat after dinner.
